titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1843) to extend the termination date for the exemption of returning workers from numerical limitations for temporary workers.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mr. Boustany. Petition No: 110-6.

bill.summary: 3/6/2008--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1843) to extend the termination date for the exemption of returning workers from numerical limitations for temporary workers.
